name.japanese: ウシウシの実 モデル:麒麟
name.romanized: Ushi Ushi no Mi, Moderu: Kirin

abilities.description: Kaku can transform into a giraffe-human hybrid, gaining increased strength, durability, and an extremely long neck.
By retracting his neck excessively, Kaku's neck disappears while his limbs extend dramatically, like putting dough through a pasta machine.
Kaku retracts his neck like a spring and fires it out cannon-style using his hardened rectangular nose for a powerful piercing attack.
Kaku strikes airborne enemies with his rectangular, hardened neck.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weaknesses (sea water, Seastone)

keyMoments.title: Accidental Discovery of Pasta Machine
keyMoments.description: Kaku accidentally discovers the Pasta Machine form when he pulls his neck in too far while attempting Kirimanjaro.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Kaku's adaptability and creativity in discovering new applications of his Devil Fruit mid-battle.

reveals.information: Multiple new techniques revealed including Pasta Machine, Kyoku Bigan: Kirimanjaro, and Kama Kirin
